appLayoutFunctions.menus.close.shortDescription: Close any menu which is an instance of `ui.models.appLayout.Menu`.

params.name: domObject
params.description: DOM object of menu to close. Default: `dom.element("div[menu]")`.

params.name: children
params.description: Children or content to include in component. Default: `[]`.

params.name: style
params.description: Styling to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: events
params.description: Events to listen to on component. Default: `{}`.

ui.models.appLayout.MenuBar.longDescription: Has similar properties to an HTML `div` element with attribute `menubar`.

params.name: children
params.description: Children or content to include in component. Default: `[]`.

params.name: style
params.description: Styling to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: events
params.description: Events to listen to on component. Default: `{}`.

ui.models.appLayout.Content.longDescription: Has similar properties to an HTML `div` element with attribute `appcontent`.

params.name: children
params.description: Children or content to include in component. Default: `[]`.

params.name: style
params.description: Styling to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: events
params.description: Events to listen to on component. Default: `{}`.

ui.models.appLayout.MenuContent.longDescription: Has similar properties to an HTML `div` element with attribute `menucontent`.

params.name: children
params.description: Children or content to include in component. Default: `[]`.

params.name: style
params.description: Styling to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: events
params.description: Events to listen to on component. Default: `{}`.

appLayoutFunctions.menus.open.shortDescription: Open any menu which is an instance of `ui.models.appLayout.Menu`.

params.name: domObject
params.description: DOM object of menu to open. Default: `dom.element("div[menu]")`.

appLayoutFunctions.menus.register.shortDescription: Register any menu for events and accessibility which is an instance of `ui.models.appLayout.Menu`.

params.name: domObject
params.description: DOM object of menu to register. Default: `dom.element("div[menu]")`.

ui.models.appLayout.MenuBarButton.longDescription:
Has similar properties to an HTML `button` element with attribute `menubarbutton`.
It is recommended to only have an icon representing the button.

params.name: children
params.description: Children or content to include in component. Default: `[]`.

params.name: style
params.description: Styling to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: events
params.description: Events to listen to on component. Default: `{}`.

ui.models.appLayout.MenuDivider.longDescription: Has similar properties to an HTML `hr` element with attribute `menudivider`.

params.name: style
params.description: Styling to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: events
params.description: Events to listen to on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: attributes

ui.models.appLayout.Menu.longDescription:
Has similar properties to an HTML `div` element with attribute `menu`.
Should have children `ui.models.appLayout.MenuTitle` and `ui.models.appLayout.MenuContent`.

params.name: children
params.description: Children or content to include in component. Default: `[]`.

params.name: style
params.description: Styling to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.name: events
params.description: Events to listen to on component. Default: `{}`.
